alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 5:23PM EDT until July 12 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DELAWARE COUNTY... At 523 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Colchester, or near Walton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Walton, Harvard, Corbett, East Branch, Shinhopple, Rock Rift, Beerston, Bear Spring Mountain Campground and Fishs Eddy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
